name: Heracles (Tsadeest Game Dev)
description:
HERACLES

Ready to get lost in an immersive adventure?

Ready for some great fights?

Ready to get amazed?

Now, it's time to have your own journey!

Play as Heracles, a loving father and a valorous hero from Greek mythology. Roam many landscapes around the world. Complete all the quests and conquer the devils to prove that you are as heroic as him!

In this game, you can...

  1. Complete 12 labors we have set!
  2. Obtain stories from many different characters!
  3. Expand your knowledge of the astonishing Greek mythology while killing the time!

If you have any advice or comment about the game, please kindly let us know!

*This is a product of Creative Digital Literature and Creative Writing courses in English Literature Department of State Islamic Institute of Surakarta.*

-Thanks to:

Allah SWT.
